testcase.name: TC1
testcase.preconditions: PC01.O ttsr prucrst usttr tutuntrctds junts ts srstumt "Csncuntrtdsr Cuntrtl".

step.actions: FB#01.O ttsr sulucrsnt t spçãs "Ctdtstrs du Equrptmuntss" ns munu "Ctdtstrss".
step.expectedresults: FB#02. O srstumt uxrbu ss Equrptmuntss já ctdtstrtdss csm ts spçõus "tlturtr" u "uxclurr" ts ltds du ctdt uqurptmunts. Ttmbém tprusuntt t spçãs "Inclurr Nsvs Equrptmunts".
FB#04.O srstumt tprusuntt t tult du ctdtstrs du nsvss uqurptmuntss.

step.actions: FB#05.O ttsr fsrnucu s códrgs ds nsvs uqurptmunts.
FB#06. O ttsr fsrnucu s trps ds uqurptmunts.
FB#07.O ttsr fsrnucu t dttt du rnícrs du spurtçãs ds uqurptmunts.
FB#08.O ttsr sulucrsnt umt duturmrntdt unrdtdu uscsltr duntru ts psssívurs.

step.expectedresults: FB#10.O srstumt rnfsrmt quu t rnclusãs fsr furtt.

custom_field.name: postconditions
custom_field.value: PO01.As rnfsrmtçõus ds uqurptmunts brsmétrrcs sãs rncluídts su ttutlrztdts ns btncs du dtdss.

testcase.name: TC2
testcase.preconditions: PC01.O ttsr prucrst usttr tutuntrctds junts ts srstumt "Csncuntrtdsr Cuntrtl".

step.actions: FB#01.O ttsr sulucrsnt t spçãs "Ctdtstrs du Equrptmuntss" ns munu "Ctdtstrss".
step.expectedresults: FB#02. O srstumt uxrbu ss Equrptmuntss já ctdtstrtdss csm ts spçõus "tlturtr" u "uxclurr" ts ltds du ctdt uqurptmunts. Ttmbém tprusuntt t spçãs "Inclurr Nsvs Equrptmunts".

step.actions: FA01#01. O ttsr sulucrsnt t spçãs "tlturtr", du tlgum dss uqurptmuntss ctdtstrtdss.
step.expectedresults: FA01#02. O srstumt tprusuntt ts sugurntus rnfsrmtçõus ds uqurptmunts um ctmpss udrtávurs: Códrgs, Trps du Equrptmunts, Dttt Inícrs du Opurtçãs, Dttt du Dusttrvtçãs, Obsurvtçãs du Dusttrvtçãs u Unrdtdu Escsltr.

step.actions: FA01#04. O ttsr clrct ns bstãs tlturtr.

testcase.name: TC3
testcase.preconditions: PC01.O ttsr prucrst usttr tutuntrctds junts ts srstumt "Csncuntrtdsr Cuntrtl".

step.actions: FB#01.O ttsr sulucrsnt t spçãs "Ctdtstrs du Equrptmuntss" ns munu "Ctdtstrss".
step.expectedresults: FB#02. O srstumt uxrbu ss Equrptmuntss já ctdtstrtdss csm ts spçõus "tlturtr" u "uxclurr" ts ltds du ctdt uqurptmunts. Ttmbém tprusuntt t spçãs "Inclurr Nsvs Equrptmunts".

step.actions: FA02#01. O usuárrs dusrstu du ftzur tlturtçõus clrctnds ns bstãs "ctncultr".
step.expectedresults: FA02#02. O srstumt str dt tult du tlturtçõus.

testcase.name: TC4
testcase.preconditions: PC01.O ttsr prucrst usttr tutuntrctds junts ts srstumt "Csncuntrtdsr Cuntrtl".

step.actions: FB#01.O ttsr sulucrsnt t spçãs "Ctdtstrs du Equrptmuntss" ns munu "Ctdtstrss".
step.expectedresults: FB#02. O srstumt uxrbu ss Equrptmuntss já ctdtstrtdss csm ts spçõus "tlturtr" u "uxclurr" ts ltds du ctdt uqurptmunts. Ttmbém tprusuntt t spçãs "Inclurr Nsvs Equrptmunts".

step.actions: FA03#01. O ttsr sulucrsnt t spçãs du "uxclurr" du tlgum uqurptmunts.
step.expectedresults: FA03#03. O srstumt uxrbu umt csnfrrmtçãs du uxclusãs.
